info.title: Source: Zenit requested 200 million roubles from CSCA for the Circular Winter Transfer
Three Zenita players entered the top five of the most expensive winter RPL season 2023/24
Krasnodar announced the purchase of Viktor Sa
In Zenite, Mario Fernandez ' s exclusion from the application for RPL was explained
Spartacus won the last four matches at the general account 19:0

Kyu Kyu will move from CSKA to Pari NN to rent
Barcelona may intercept Mbape at the Reala
Zenit excluded the Circular from the request for the season. The Protector will join the CSAC in the summer.
Promeza has been declared an international search.
Neumar may leave Saudi Arabia for return to Santos
Sochi leases Stormina to Zenita
Radio: Inside Spartacus, anarchy prevails. The only person who develops is Abascal.
There's a blue card in football. First details are known

Chalov, at the invitation of Guiner, arrived in Moscow to discuss a new contract with CSCA
Agent Jikii: " If Abascal stays in Spartacus, there will be no new contract "
Mbappe will announce the transition to Real next week.

Hamil Gazisov settled the dispute over Spartacus.
